item.title: Analyzing Miners’ Volatility at the End of December
Barrick Gold says Latam key to growth as it adds director
item.description: [Reuters - UK Focus] - Dec (Shanghai: 600875.SS - news) 6 (Reuters) - Latin America will play an increasingly important role in Barrick Gold (Hanover: ABR.HA - news) 's growth strategy, the world's biggest gold miner said on Tuesday as it named a new director with decades of mining experience in that region. The company said it had appointed Pablo Marcet to its board. Marcet worked for 15 years for global miner BHP Billiton (NYSE: BBL - news) and was president of Northern Orion Resources' South American operations before the company was acquired by Yamana Gold (Xetra: RNY.DE - news) .
